resources.string: www.aokp.co - Find all newest releases here
View or change how the \'cLock\' widget will be displayed.
Shows Search-bar in the recent apps window
Include foreground task when clearing all
Don\'t send touch events for navigation and status bar gestures to apps
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Interactive changelog pulled live from our Gerrit instance
Use custom application instead of the recent applications dialog
Enter a name for the new app group
Wake up device if a charger is plugged in or unplugged
Enable to allow custom actions for the hardware keys to be set.
Whether double tapping the volume keys will lock and unlock the auto-rotate setting
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Display the number of pending notifications
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Show the weather in the status bar header
Enable data to persist across installs
Persist file app_process for Xposed framework
Rearrange by dragging by the handle on the right. Remove by swiping.
Enable the swipe area for this Ribbon
Vibrate on touch of swipe area
Choose the order in which your toggles are displayed
Select the side that triggers the fast toggle
Swipe to switch between notifications and Quick Settings
Rearrange by dragging by the handle on the right. Remove by swiping.
Close shade on all generic toggle actions
Vibrate on all generic toggle actions
Delay for screenshot toggle to send intent to capture screen
Show arrow keys while keyboard is shown
Do you want to reset the Navigation Ring?
Choose number of targets in the navigation ring
Drag your finger to targets to assign actions
Use the volume keys to wake the screen
Whether volume up/down can be long pressed to skip track
Set wether the lockscreen challenge (circle, pattern, pin) is minimized when the screen is turned on.
Navigation Bar height while in portrait
Navigation Bar height while in landscape
Navigation Bar height if the bar is along a side
Shows the content behind your lockscreen, your data may be visible to those around you
An arc around the lockscreen handle representing battery level
Use the menu key to unlock the screen
Whether safe headset volume warning is shown
Play sound when adjusting volume with hard keys
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
The LED is used as charging indicator
Click on the LED to change the color
Flash LED while screen is on
"Would you like to change the app: "
.\n\nPlease turn off your screen to see the LED. Don\'t hit OK on this popup until you\'re done viewing the LED color.
Turn screen on and show all notifications when device is pulled out of pocket. Turn screen off when device gets back into pocket.
Always turn screen on when pulled out of pocket, even when there are no notifications pending
Hide low priority notifications such as google now weather notifications
Allow dismissing even non clearable notifications. Of course, they\'re just hidden from lockscreen and not from the notification panel.
Add possibility to toggle between normal and expanded view by longpress. The expanded view sometimes shows more private information so you might want to disable it.
Show notifications expanded by default. You still will be able to toggle between expanded and normal view.
Wake device when a new notification is received
Number of notifications displayed at once
Offset to the top of the screen:
Disables notifications from being shown and dismissed. This way, you just see the icons of your notifications.
Excluded applications will not show up as lockscreen notifications
Don\'t show heads up in these applications. Remove by swiping.
Don\'t show heads up from these applications. Remove by swiping.
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Superuser indicator is visible when a session is active
Toggle to show superuser indicator when a session is active
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.

Apps will show in app circle bar
